plot: When you hear death saying "I'm coming," you realise that it will. The film looks at the "box of trouble" that can be found in every house in this world.
title: Slow Death
plot_es: When you hear death saying "I'm coming," you realise that it will. The film looks at the "box of trouble" that can be found in every house in this world.
plot_en: When you hear death saying "I'm coming," you realise that it will. The film looks at the "box of trouble" that can be found in every house in this world.
